title: T-shirt font
content:
Anyone recognizes this font? Note the high middle junction (?) on the M. Sorry about the low resolution!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [92026.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017052348/http:/typophile.com/files/92026.jpg) | 10.88 KB |
author: Mans

comments.content: Looks a bit like DIN 1451 Engschrift or the contemporary digitization by [Albert-Jan Pool](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017052348/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Albert-Jan%20Pool) FF DIN Condensed.
